text.section:
Sec. 21-209. Notice.
Operators are encouraged but not required to conspicuously display in or about the premises of an establishment, a legibly printed notice in English, Spanish and Creole in substantially the following form: "IT IS UNLAWFUL FOR A PERSON UNDER THE AGE OF SEVENTEEN (17) TO REMAIN ON THESE PREMISES BETWEEN THE HOURS OF 11:00 P.M. TO 6:00 A.M. THE FOLLOWING DAY FROM SUNDAY TO THURSDAY AND THE HOURS OF 12:00 MIDNIGHT TO 6:00 A.M. THE FOLLOWING DAY FROM FRIDAY EVENING TO SUNDAY MORNING UNLESS SPECIFICALLY ALLOWED BY LAW."
